segmentosSRT.text:
But not my money.
They sound like a pack of mules.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: They're too tired. Been at it all night.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Little bastards from big bastards grow.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I learned all I know from you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
How do you think we lost
most of what we had in the first place?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
You're the one they call big bastard, Xu,
not me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
Mother, when you finish,
send him to his room.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: He's just singing to himself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: You're up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: What's wrong?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Can't rush these things.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's growing up. Another's on the way.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: No, have him wait. I'll be right there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: This is the last time, okay? I promise.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: get a rickshaw to take my wife home. I'm...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
It's just a bunch of puppets.
Get rid of them! This is war!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: They're not mine. It's how I make my living.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: What happened? No one's left?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: How?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- On one of the wounded.
- It's a killing field.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I just dragged a cannon and sang opera.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: What class do we belong to?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Landlords?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
Surely not. We lost that status to Long'er.
So, what are we?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: they captured two mountains a day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: This hasn't anything to do with us adults.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: We don't know what's going on.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Do you expect me to believe that?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- Are you going?
- No.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- Are you going or not?
- No!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- I'm telling you to go!
- No!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Said he was a saboteur. I had to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Why wouldn't he just apologize?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I hit him for not obeying.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: That's no excuse.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: You spoil him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: How so?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Can't you see I'm doing this for our family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Don't you understand?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: If you indulge him, we'll all go to ruin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I'll hit him again if I have to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Sit then. Right in front of me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Ask him again.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Say I want him to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, is that tea for me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Good boy, bring it over here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Daddy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: How do you like my singing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: You little bastard! I'll break your legs!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Xia, Youqing, have some dumplings.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Have some lunch first.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: No, really.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Anything is possible.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu said he was a Red Guard.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't rush off!
- I'll make you something to eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Do stay! Come on inside.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi painted this.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: At least it's loud enough for her to hear.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Isn't the tea ready yet?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng's been here for ages.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Just say what you want.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: You, a capitalist?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Niu, don't let it get to you. Take care!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Okay, we're going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- Sorry for the trouble.
- It's our job.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Where's Erxi?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text:
- Already?
- We didn't hear a sound.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: We'll see them soon.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Did he eat all seven buns?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, just gobbled them up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Careful, it's hot.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Wouldn't Dr. Wang know?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: He's eaten too much.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: What do you mean?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04

segmentosSRT.text: Take the medicine to Granny.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_04
